properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) Id from which AccessPoint will allow requests.

type.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) Id from which AccessPoint will allow requests.

properties.name: Bucket
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket you want to associate this AccessPoint with.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket you want to associate this AccessPoint with.

properties.name: VpcConfiguration
properties.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) from which requests can be made to the AccessPoint.

type.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) from which requests can be made to the AccessPoint.

properties.name: Policy
properties.description: The access point policy associated with this access point.

type.description: The access point policy associated with this access point.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified AccessPoint.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified AccessPoint.
